file_content.text: The skies are clear. The Gormak are gone.
Gormak cannons are silent. You succeed where Voss fail.
The Shrine of Healing is open to you.
If you wish to reach the Mystics or their guests, you must complete the trials.
Can you handle the Gormak if I leave?
Keep order here.
More commandos will come. The Gormak will not return.
What are these trials? How do they work?
The trials?
The trials are for the Mystics. Few know what they face.
You honor me.
The trials are dangerous. You may turn back.
Dalga-Wo guards the Proving Grounds. Speak with him to begin the trials.
The shuttles will bring Voss. I must guide them.
The Gormak must be stopped.
Fadith-Ki. I need access to the Shrine of Healing.
The shrine is for the Mystics. Outsiders are not worthy.
Even the Voss cannot enter now. The Gormak attack us. It is no longer safe.
How do I become worthy to enter the shrine?
I still need to get inside.
Prove your intentions. Help us defeat the Gormak.
What do you mean?
Defend yourselves.
Outsider. You are skilled in battle. We are desperate.
I am Fadith-Ki. I guide pilgrims to the Shrine of Healing.
Pilgrims can no longer reach this place. The Gormak will kill any who try.
What is the Shrine of Healing?
Shrine of Healing?
The shrine is for the Mystics. Many come seeking their healing and guidance. No more.
I need more details.
Do I look like a Voss commando to you?
Not my problem.
The commandos cannot fight Gormak technology.
The Gormak have built powerful cannons that can destroy aircraft in flight.
Shuttles from Voss-Ka crash. Pilgrims die. The Gormak are pleased.
What do the Gormak have against Voss pilgrims?
Pilgrims are no threat.
Gormak are beasts. They do not know reason.
Why should I help?
Few outsiders learn the power of the Mystics. You will be worthy.
Let me handle this.
An outsider is our last resort.
The Gormak have claimed an abandoned training camp. The cannons are located there.
Enter the camp. Destroy the Gormak cannons. You will earn our respect.
Keep your ships grounded until I return.
This won't take long.
The Voss are safe here.
I haven't had the chance for much blood sport on Voss.
This should be fun.
The Gormak are a plague. They deserve their fate.
A big pile of Gormak garbage, coming right up.
You got it, buddy.
Keep their corruption far from this place.
The Gormak will never trouble this sacred place again.
I would be honored.
Make certain. Spare no one.
If I really have to.
I certainly hope so.
Voss are dying. The shrine is sacred. Do not fail.
There is nothing for outsiders here.
No deal. [Refuse quest.]
Few can reach the shrine. We are trapped.
